CID Is Going Off Air After 21 Years & These 15 Memes Will Make You Laugh & Cry At The Same Time
CID Is Going Off Air After 21 Years & These 15 Memes Will Make You Laugh & Cry At The Same Time
If you would often pass your time watching CID on TV especially on weekend, you would no longer be able to do so. India’s longest running TV show CID is going off air. The crime-drama show that entertained us for 21 long years is finally coming to an end.
Sony TV
Dayanand Shetty, who plays the role of Daya on the show, has confirmed that the news is true. Talking to TOI, he said, “Yes, it's true. We were recently informed about this development and we stopped shooting for the show some 4/5 days back. This Saturday (October 27, 2018) telecast will be the last episode of CID.”
Sony TV
And fans are so disappointed that they started #SaveCID campaign on social media. Furthermore, people are expressing their feeling through memes and jokes.
